docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
Install the latest version with pip install gemseo-pdfo.

See pip for more information.

docs.title: Bugs and questions
docs.text: Please use the gitlab issue tracker to submit bugs or questions.

docs.title: References
docs.text: Ragonneau, T.M., Zhang, Z. PDFO: a cross-platform package for Powell’s derivative-free optimization solvers. Math. Prog. Comp. 16, 535–559 (2024). https://doi.org/10.1007/s12532-024-00257-9

docs.title: Changelog
docs.text:
All notable changes of this project will be documented here.

The format is based on Keep a Changelog and this project adheres to Semantic Versioning.

docs.title: Fixed
docs.text: • Fixed an issue with the PDFO_COBYLA_Settings class that prevented the algorithm from being initialized correctly.

docs.title: Credits
docs.text:
These projects were used to build gemseo-pdfo. Thank you!

Python | uv

docs.title: pdfo
docs.text: PDFO optimization library wrapper, see the PDFO website.

docs.title: PDFOAlgorithmDescription dataclass
docs.text:
PDFOAlgorithmDescription(
    library_name: str = "PDFO",
    Settings: type[BasePDFOSettings] = BasePDFOSettings,
)

Bases: OptimizationAlgorithmDescription

The description of an optimization algorithm from the PDFO library.

docs.title: Settings class-attribute instance-attribute
docs.text:
Settings: type[BasePDFOSettings] = BasePDFOSettings

The option valiation model for PDFO optimization library.

docs.title: PDFOOpt
docs.text:
PDFOOpt(algo_name: str)

Bases: BaseOptimizationLibrary

PDFO optimization library interface.

See OptimizationLibrary.

Notes

The missing current values of the :class:.DesignSpace attached to the :class:.OptimizationProblem are automatically initialized with the method :meth:.DesignSpace.initialize_missing_current_values.

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

Parameters:

  • algo_name (str) –

    The algorithm name.

Raises:

  • KeyError –

    When the algorithm is not in the library.

Source code in src/gemseo_pdfo/pdfo.py 
def __init__(self, algo_name: str) -> None:  # noqa: D107
    super().__init__(algo_name)
    self.name = "PDFO"

docs.title: base_pdfo_settings
docs.text: Settings for the optimization algorithms from PDFO.
